document_data.name: Were-Tongues
document_data.mainbody: The '''Were-Tongues''' or '''Were-Tongues of Lycanthropy''' was a general term to refer collectively to the racial languages of [[lycanthrope]]s.<ref group="note" name="true">Though it is not outright stated in the text, it can be assumed that these racial languages belong to and are used by the natural or true lycanthropes, those who were born with the condition, rather than something that's inherently learned upon being infected or cursed with [[lycanthropy]]. Every type of lycanthrope had its own distinct racial language.<ref> These languages were not mutually intelligible, thus [[weretiger]]s could not speak the language of [[werebear]]s and vice-versa.
document_data.Notable Speakers: * [[Sea druid]]s, a type of [[specialty priest]] in the [[Church of Deep Sashelas]], were known to learn various other aquatic languages. These included those of aquatic lycanthropes, such as [[wereshark]]s.
